hudson.plugins.python.Python.command:
import urllib2
# -- get the filename for latest install_stcapi*.py from main Jenkins server stc_restapi_job_url = 'http://jenkins.cal.ci.spirentcom.com:8080/job/stcapi_rest_api/lastSuccessfulBuild/api/xml?xpath=/*/artifact[1]/fileName' html = urllib2.urlopen(stc_restapi_job_url) install_stcapi_filename = html.read() install_stcapi_filename = install_stcapi_filename.replace('<fileName>', '') install_stcapi_filename = install_stcapi_filename.replace('</fileName>', '') print "Filename: %s" % install_stcapi_filename
# -- get the python script stc_restapi_py = 'http://jenkins.cal.ci.spirentcom.com:8080/job/stcapi_rest_api/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/deployment/' + install_stcapi_filename response = urllib2.urlopen(stc_restapi_py ) html = response.read() local_restapi_py = open(install_stcapi_filename,'w') local_restapi_py.write(html) local_restapi_py.close()
